input.sentences: the couple decided to take the day off and go for a long walk .
the traveled down the sidewalk through the perfectly manicured trees .
the passed by a lush green lawn with a fountain .
they saw a statue and other art located around the area .
they took a moment to appreciate the blossoming trees .
output.sentences: It was a nice day so Judy and Tim decided to take a walk.
As they traveled down the sidewalk they admired the beautiful trees.
They passed a lush lawn where they were tempted to run through a fountain.
They decided not to and  instead mediated on some art located in the park that included a strange statue.
They had a nice day and before they left they took a moment to study the blossoming trees.
